seo.title: Tina Cloud Pricing
seo.description: Predictable pricing for every project. Complete control of your content, forever.

blocks.intro:
**No surprises.**  Predictable pricing for every project. Complete control of your content, forever.

Tina’s source code is open-source. Your content lives in accessible formats right in your Git repository.

tierOne.name: Community
tierOne.body:
*   Tina's Community plan offers **X free users** per project
*   Each additional user being billed at **$$/month**
*   Maximum of **X users** per project

blocks.segue:
**Need a bit more?**

We have you covered.

tierTwo.name: Team
tierTwo.body:
*   Tina's **Team** plan offers **10** **users** per project
*   Each additional user being billed at **$15/month**
*   **3 Roles**

tierThree.name: Business
tierThree.body:
*   20 Users per project
*   5 Roles
*   Increased API calls
*   Priority support
